'''Rudi''' is a [[character]] in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]'' and is part of Team Tundra with [[Sacha]].

== Appearance ==
Rudi has shaved black hair, black eyes, copper colored skin, white and blue goggles, a white shirt with green cross straps, a spruce green and golden belt, spruce green finger-less gloves and boots, and blue pants.

== Biography ==
Before the series began, Rudi was a tundra engineer.

Rudi was once teleported from his home along with the others by [[CommuniKate]] using a [[command block]] on the show. He and Sacha won some challenges, and in the final challenge, he with other prisoners was saved from obsidian prison and they sabotaged their way back home, but were teleported to the [[Greek Isles]]. [[Poseidon]] teleported Rudi to a sand pillar in the [[Kraken]] Sea along with the other heroes, and he spent most of the season there. Then at the end, all the heroes escape and try to stop Poseidon. After a while, [[Zeus]] comes, defeats Poseidon, and asks heroes to help him. After helping the god, Rudi and Sacha apparently returned home.

== Personality ==
Rudi is affable, cheerful, and energetic. He likes food and treasure but isn't greedy.

== Relationships ==
=== Sacha ===
Him and Sacha have a teammate relationship they always work together to win.

== Trivia ==
* Rudi is based on the "Tundra Engineer" from Mattel which in turn was based on a skin by the same name in [[Biome Settlers Skin Pack 1]].
